title: Indra Neelam & Kundan Haaram: The Regal Diamond Cascade
materials: Ruby Drops. Features the authentic Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A stunning blend of traditional and modern aesthetics. This haaram features geometric Indra Neelam gemstones with intricate carvings, interspersed with luminous Kundan Polki diamonds. Delicate ruby drops add a touch of feminine charm. The setting showcases exquisite craftsmanship, highlighting each stone's unique character. The central pendant is a geometric piece with carved Neelam surrounded by rose-cut diamonds.
occasions: or any grand celebration. A perfect statement piece for Seemantham
description: This haaram is a testament to the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry-making. The use of natural Kundan and carefully selected gemstones adds to its value and exclusivity. The intricate carvings on the Neelam and the rose-cut diamonds showcase exceptional craftsmanship. It is a durable and timeless piece that will be treasured for generations.
